description: Application to clear condition 6 (As-Built SAP Outputs) of approved application DM2020/00306.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Prior to first occupation, 'as-built' SAP outputs based on both SAP2012 and SAP10 emissions shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing to demonstrate that the development has been carried out in accordance with the approved details. If the development is unable to meet the required reduction in CO2 emissions through the approved energy strategy, then any shortfall shall be made up through the application of further sustainability measures. All the approved measures shall be thereafter retained for as long as the develoment is in exsistance.
